title: Missed Call Notification not resetting
content:
After each missed call I receive, the missed call notification from Call Management comes up and says I have missed X number of calls, but the counter doesn't reset when I clear the notification tile.  You can see an example in the attached image.  Rather, it just adds one more to the count every missed call.  So when I check my phone, it looks like someone has been frantically trying to get a hold of me.  How can I clear this count?  I have already cleared the call history logs.

Thanks
